dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Ellen Herb/CORPHQ/NYTIMES [mailto:herbe@nytimes.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 08, 2005 10:11 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement

To:  Lance Crosby

The attached email was sent to you on March 2.  To date we have not received
a response to our request to take down copyright infringing material from
www.cdnn.info.

Please contact me via email or phone today.

Thank you.

Ellen Herb
The New York Times Company
Legal Department
229 W. 43d Street   12th floor
New York, NY  10036
(ph)  212-556-1920
(fax) 212-556-4634
----- Forwarded by Ellen Herb/CORPHQ/NYTIMES on 03/08/2005 11:11 AM -----
                                                                           
             Ellen                                                         
             Herb/CORPHQ/NYTIM                                             
             ES                                                         To 
                                       copyright@theplanet.com             
             03/02/2005 04:21                                           cc 
             PM                                                            
                                                                   Subject 
                                       Copyright Infringement              
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           
                                                                           



Lance Crosby, Esq.
Chief Operating Officer
ThePlanet.com

I am with the Legal Department of The New York Times Company.   The New
York Times Company owns The Sarasota Herald Tribune (www.heraldtribune.com)
and The Ocala Star Banner (www.starbanner.com).

It has come to our attention that www.cdnn.info, a website hosted by
theplanet.com, is publishing, without permission, copyrighted articles from
both The Sarasota Herald Tribune and The Ocala Star Banner.  Using
copyrighted material without permission is clearly copyright infringement;
it does not constitute "fair use," despite the claim made by www.cdnn.info.

See these links:
http://www.cdnn.info/eco/e040229/e040229.html
http://www.cdnn.info/safety/s040127/s040127.html
http://www.cdnn.info/eco/e030920b/e030920b.html

Also attached below are three screen shots from the archives of
www.heraldtribune.com and www.ocala.com, showing the material being used by
cdnn.info.

This use of our copyrighted material is in clear violation of
theplanet.com's trademark and copyright policy.

Please respond to this email and let me know if this matter can be resolved
directly through theplanet.com.

Thank you.

Ellen Herb
The New York Times Company
Legal Department
229 W. 43d Street   12th floor
New York, NY  10036
(ph)  212-556-1920
(fax) 212-556-4634

(Embedded image moved to file: pic04031.jpg) (Embedded image moved to file:
pic12052.jpg)(Embedded image moved to file:
pic27350.jpg)
Please note that the information above is true and accurate.  The
Complaining Party is authorized to act on behalf of The New York Times
Company in the matter above.
